name: QUBIC (itch)
description:
QUBIC is a retro-like turn-based puzzle game in which your task is to solve the labyrinth, collect the stars to unlock next level, avoid enemies/traps and... SAVE YOUR QUBIC GREEN ASS!

Key features:
  • Different levels that will blow your brain!
  • Mad retro-like 16bit pixel graphics!
  • Fast turn-based game-play!
  • Simple controls and cubic-like visual style.
  • Prepare for DOUBLE-PENE... TROUBLE!
Minimum system requirements:

50MB disk space, 256MB RAM, Keyboard & mouse
PC: Windows XP+, 1.2GHz+ x86-compatible processor (Intel Atom 1.6GHz+ for netbooks)
MAC: OS X 10.7+, Intel Core Duo 1.66GHz+
Linux: Ubuntu 12.04+ or SteamOS , 1.2GHz or faster processor

Performance may vary on older/slower machines.
